key.name: font-family
key.description: Sets the font family and size for the terminal.

key.name: window-width
key.description: Sets the default width of the terminal window.

key.name: window-height
key.description: Sets the default height of the terminal window.

key.name: opacity
key.description: Sets the opacity level of the terminal window (0.0 for fully transparent, 1.0 for fully opaque).
